description: Creates a new hardware security module (HSM) in the specified CloudHSM cluster. Cross-account use: No. You cannot perform this operation on an CloudHSM cluster in a different Amazon Web Service account.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the HSM's cluster. To find the cluster ID, use  DescribeClusters.

parameters.name: AvailabilityZone
parameters.description: The Availability Zone where you are creating the HSM. To find the cluster's Availability Zones, use  DescribeClusters.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone that contains the HSM.

nested_items.name: ClusterId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the cluster that contains the HSM.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet that contains the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

nested_items.name: EniId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

nested_items.name: EniIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

nested_items.name: EniIpV6
nested_items.description: The IPv6 address (if any) of the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

nested_items.name: StateMessage
nested_items.description: A description of the HSM's state.
